text.p: Iceland and Lithuania drew 0-0 in their World Cup European zone group eight qualifying round on Wednesday.

Iceland -1-Kristjan Finnbogason, 4-Sigurdur Jonsson, 7-Gudni Bergsson, 2-Larus Orri Sigurdsson, 11-Eyjolfur Sverrisson, 6-Runar Kristinsson, 3-Thordur Gudjonsson, 5-Sigursteinn Gislason, 10-Arnor Gudjohnsen, 9-Arnar Gunnlaugsson, 8-Bjarki Gunnlaugsson. Reserves - 72nd minute Arnar Gunnlaugsson replaced by 15-Helgi Sigurdsson, 79th minute Gislason replaced by 13-Arnar Gertarsson, 82nd minute Gudjonsson replaced by 14- Rikhargur Dadason.

Lithuania - 1-Gintaras Stauche, 2-Tomas Ziukus, 3-Andrejus Tereskinas, 4-Giedrius Zutautas, 5-Raimondas Vainoras, 6-Irnantas Stumbrys, 7-Raimondas Zutautas, 8-Vaidotas Slekys, 9-Aidas Treiksaitis, 10-Aurelijus Skarabalius, 11-Edjaras Jankauskas.
